titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 175th anniversary of the abolition of slavery in the British Empire on August 1, 1834.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 8/3/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes the fundamental importance of the abolition of slavery in the British Empire in the history of the United States and Canada and celebrates the 175th anniversary of the abolition of slavery in the British Empire on August 1, 1834.
